statements: DELETE FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_reason = 'Incomplete Information';
DELETE FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE applicant_id = 10 AND rejection_reason = 'Insufficient credit history'
DELETE FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE application_id = 101 AND rejection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM risk_assessment WHERE assessment_date <= '2022-06-30' AND application_id IN (SELECT application_id FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_reason = 'High Risk');
DELETE FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_id = 101 AND applicant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM credit_scores WHERE application_id = 101 AND credit_score > 700;
DELETE FROM rejection_history WHERE application_id = 100 AND reason_id = 2
